outputs.output_descr:
The Sudan recovery Fund - Stabilization programme for Jonglei is to support roll out of pilot activities in Jonglei State.
The PIP focuses on; construction of 15 Km road stretch in Bor using a labour based approach, preparatory activities to establish and set-up as state managed radio station in Bor and conduct a rapid capacity assessment and formulate a capacity development plan for the state ministries of finance ad physical infrastructure; and oversight and coordination of the initiation phase.

donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
outputs.output_descr:
1. State-managed radio station established in Bor, Jonglei.
2. Akobo-Pochalla road constructed, without surfacing, through a labor-based and mechanized approach.

donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
outputs.output_descr:
1. Rehabilitation of the Lobira-Chahari-Lotome-Kikilei-Lotukei-Kanangok in Southern Kidepo Valley.
2. Four county headquarters and one prison constructed and equipped.
3. Four water reservoirs or haffirs (30,000m³ each) for cattle, and six boreholes and one water filtration unit for human consumption.

project_descr: SRF State Stabilization Programmes in South Sudan
